document_data.name: The Way of the Warrior
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Way of the Warrior
document_data.mainbody: The '''Way of the Warrior''' was the guildhall of a [[fighter]]'s guild in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located in south Zhentil Keep in the western section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in front of the [[River Trail Gate]] in between [[Mace Way]] and [[Slingshot Way]].
document_data.Description: The hall was long and sat low to the ground. A shrine to [[Tempus]] could be found within.
document_data.Inhabitants: The guildmaster in the {{YearlinkName|1369}} was [[Cerenna True-edge]].
